attributes.action: Intoduce a total disregard of War Pensions in means-testing benefits in line with Civilian DLA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel it is unjust to take into account the amount of a war pensioners' pension - minus the £10.00 disregard - when calculating entitlement to means-tested benefits.

Civilian disability benefits such as Disabled Living Allowance ( DLA ) is totally disregarded so too should War Pensions.
